## CompareStateParams interface

A parameter builder interface for comparing two instances of the editor state.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface CompareStateParams<GSchema extends EditorSchema = any> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [newState](./core-types.comparestateparams.newstate.md) | <code>EditorState&lt;GSchema&gt;</code> | The latest snapshot of the prosemirror editor state. |
|  [oldState](./core-types.comparestateparams.oldstate.md) | <code>EditorState&lt;GSchema&gt;</code> | The previous snapshot of the prosemirror editor state. |
